question: A body of mass 0.25 kg travels along a straight line from x = 0 to x = 2 m with a speed v = kx³/² where k = 2 SI units. The work done by the net force during this displacement is
explanation: Work done = Change in Kinetic Energy (W_net = ΔKE).
Final velocity at x=2 is v = 2(2)³/² = 2(2√2) = 4√2 m/s.
